projects.name: Individual
projects.description: Projects that I have completed on my own, showcasing my personal interests, skills, and creativity.

projects.name: Collaboration
projects.description: Showcases my ability to work effectively with others and highlights the strengths and contributions of each team member.

projects.name: Product clones
projects.description: Reverse-engineered projects showcasing ability to replicate and improve upon existing products or services while adding unique touches and improvements.

projects.name: Verticle
projects.description: Tailored projects addressing specific needs & challenges of a particular industry/niche, including industry-specific features, marketing materials, & consulting services.

projects.name: JavaScript
projects.description: Projects demonstrating proficiency in the popular programming language, including interactive features, dynamic content, & enhanced user experience.

projects.name: Case Studies
projects.description: Real-world examples showcasing problem-solving skills for clients or personal projects, providing detailed insights into thought process & approach to problem-solving.

individual.name: PeerCashew
individual.description: PeerCashew is a peer-to-peer lending platform that allows borrowers to connect with investors and obtain loans.

individual.name: UrbanEyes
individual.description: UrbanEyes is designed to help cities and communities become more efficient, sustainable, and livable.

individual.name: Mixology
individual.description: Mixology is a Single Page Application allowing different kinds of selection operations over Cocktail recipes.

individual.name: Rhythmiq
individual.description: Rhythmiq is a music app built with the Spotify API and React. With Rhythmiq, users can listen to their favorite songs, discover new music, and create custom playlists.

collaboration.name: PickMeInACup
collaboration.description: PickMeInACup is a web application built using the React framework that enables users to easily order their favorite plant milk coffees from the comfort of their own homes.

collaboration.name: TaskHive
collaboration.description: This is a web application for managing tasks. The application allows users to create tasks, assign tasks to projects, set deadlines, prioritize tasks, and track their progress.
